unnormalised: Arre yaar, Mumbai-nt property-chi kimat pishachch aasa! Mhaka Andheri-nt ek 1BHK ₹1.5 Cr-ak dislem! Ani sq ft-chi rate ₹25,000 asa mhunn somza. Mhojea broker-an sanglam ki te udya vorsak 10% vaddonk xakta mhunn. Konnukui ghara koxem melonk xakta aizkal? Down payment-ui lagbag 20 lakhs aasa!
normalised: Arre yaar, Mumbai-nt property-chi kimmat pagal jaisa asa! Mhaka Andheri-nt ek one B-H-K distle rupee ek point panch crore-ak! Ani square feet-cho rate mhantar rupee panchvis hazar asa sopeponan. Mhojea broker-an sanglle ki to udent vorsan dha percent-an vaddonk xakta. Konnui koso ghar gheunk xakta atamchea kallan? Down payment panchvis lakh asa!
